casebody.data:
Steve Michael BEYLUND, petitioner,
v.
Grant LEVI, Director, North Dakota Department of Transportation. No. 14-1507. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 29, 2016.

Motion of Indiana Tech Law School Amicus Project for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae in support of neither party granted. Motion of petitioner to dispense with printing the joint appendix granted.
